attributes.action: improve the employment laws of the British people to stop us being the sweatshop of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are losing jobs in this country as it is so easy for companies to sack employees, we are all working longer than ever before we are all struggling with poor wages, poor terms and conditions. Whilst the leaders of our companies do less and less for more money than ever paid before, let us have a little social justice

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
